Package SpaceExplorer.CrewMembers

Class CrewMember

  • java.lang.Object
    • SpaceExplorer.CrewMembers.CrewMember
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Chef, Doctor, Mechanic, Scout, SpaceBard, SpaceMarine
    public abstract class CrewMember
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a crew member and their associated functionality.
    Version:
    1.0, May 2019
    Author:
    Saahil Hari and Isaac Walton

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CrewMember.ActionResult
      This nested class is used for keeping track of a message and whether the action associated with it was a success

      • CrewMember

        public CrewMember​(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String crewClass,
                  int maxHealth,
                  int maxHunger,
                  int maxTiredness)
        A basic constructor for the CrewMember class
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the crew member
        crewClass - Class of the crew member
        maxHealth - The crew member's max health
        maxHunger - The crew member's max hunger
        maxTiredness - The crew member's max tiredness

        public boolean hasPlague()
        Getter function for whether the crew member has the plague or not
        Returns:
        True if the crew member has the plague, false otherwise

      • takeAction

        public boolean takeAction()
        Reduces the number of actions the crew member has remaining Also increases the crew member's tiredness

      • sleep

        public CrewMember.ActionResult sleep()
        The crew member sleeps, restoring their tiredness levels to full.
        Returns:
        A message stating what has occurred

      • modifyHealth

        public void modifyHealth​(int amount)
        Modifies the crew member's health
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount to modify the crew member's health by

      • setPlague

        public void setPlague​(boolean status)
        Sets the crew member's plague status. Does damage to the crew member if they get the plague

      • modifyTiredness

        public void modifyTiredness​(int amount)
        Modifies the crew member's tiredness
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount to modify the crew member's tiredness levels by

      • modifyHunger

        public void modifyHunger​(int amount)
        Modifies the crew member's hunger
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount to modify the crew member's hunger levels by

      • useItem

        public CrewMember.ActionResult useItem​(Item item)
        Uses an item on the crew member. If the item is a medical item, it restores health and cures plague based on what the medical item can do. If the item is a food item, it restores hunger.
        Parameters:
        item - An item to use on the crew member

      • repairShip

        public CrewMember.ActionResult repairShip​(Ship ship)
        Repairs the ships health and shield levels
        Parameters:
        ship - The ship the crew members are in
        Returns:
        A message stating what has occurred

      • searchPlanet

        public CrewMember.ActionResult searchPlanet​(Crew crew,
                                            Planet planet)
        Searches the current planet and has a random chance of giving the player a ship part, food/medical item, money or nothing
        Parameters:
        crew - The crew to add found items to
        planet - The current planet

      • pilotShip

        public CrewMember.ActionResult pilotShip()
        Pilots the ship to a new planet. Takes 2 crew members to do so
        Returns:
        Returns whether or not the action was successful

      • canPilotShip

        public boolean canPilotShip()
        Checks a crew member has enough actions left to pilot a ship
        Returns:
        True or false base on whether the crew member has enough actions

      • setActions

        public void setActions​(int actions)
        Sets the amount of actions the crew member can take
        Parameters:
        actions - Amount of actions

        Overrides:
